channel.title: Name This Source Please!
channel.description:
Ok I'm trying to figure out an old source that I used to play on years ago. This source was very common throughout Runescape Private Servers. You had to have accessed them via the moparisthebest.com webclient by entering the name of the server and the port.
Facts about the source:
-Trained strength on a door in east varrock -Trained attack on dummy bags in east varrock -Trained defense on hay bales in east varrock
If anyone is familiar with these training methods, they will know what source I'm talking about.

item.title: Name This Source Please!
item.dc:creator: @kris_sheehy kris_sheehy
item.description:
@kris_sheehy wrote:

Newstart was also like this.

Read full topic

item.title: Name This Source Please!
item.dc:creator: @Gavon Gavon
item.description:
@Gavon wrote:

[quote=“DannyIsSoPro, post:6, topic:447043”]GOLDSCAPE!

I swear to mother @#$!$! god I remember playing that server years ago and I believe it was called Goldscape. I’m not 100% sure though, but I feel something about that name though![/quote]

Your right! Now the hard part … i need the source from it. I’m looking to open up a server that was like that but with a bit of extras from newer servers :/. Just so everyone can see what I’m talking about, this is Goldscape: http://runescheat.forumsmotion.com/t61-goldscape-server

Read full topic

item.title: Name This Source Please!

item.description:
@DannyIsSoPro wrote:

GOLDSCAPE!

I swear to mother @#$!$! god I remember playing that server years ago and I believe it was called Goldscape. I’m not 100% sure though, but I feel something about that name though!

item.title: Name This Source Please!
item.dc:creator: @xplode xplode
item.description:
@xplode wrote:

hes talking about where you start out in varrock small bank… in full splitbark… outside is wild… and the training area is the building across from bank, and black,white armour were max cash each item and have max bonus’

i know exactly what he is talking about but i do not know name:/ maybe other people can figure from what i just wrote down

Read full topic

item.title: Name This Source Please!
item.dc:creator: @usman555 usman555
item.description:
@usman555 wrote:

Hmm… Allstarscape?

There were loads and loads of servers being released to the public a long time ago. And surprisingly, 90% weren’t leeched and self-coded. The server you’re talking about seems to be a PvP server. I suggest you use Google.

Read full topic

item.title: Name This Source Please!
item.dc:creator: @Gavon Gavon
item.description:
@Gavon wrote:

igotguts3:

er…moparscape?

No Moparscape was how you accessed a variety of different servers, however, moparscape itself was not a server.

Read full topic
